import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react' import { Link , Outlet, useNavigate} from 'react-router-dom' import Footer from './components/Footer' const UserLayout = () => { const [item,setItem]=useState({}) const [pic,setpic]=useState(""); const navigate=useNavigate(); useEffect(() => { // Bootstrap dropdown enable karne ke liye const dropdownElements = document.querySelectorAll('.dropdown-toggle'); dropdownElements.forEach(dropdown => { new window.bootstrap.Dropdown(dropdown); }); }, []); const handleSignOut = () => { // LocalStorage se data remove karna localStorage.removeItem("email"); localStorage.removeItem("role"); localStorage.removeItem("profile"); // User ko login page pe redirect karna navigate("/login"); }; return (
